original: paṇḍitarājaśrījagannāthaviracitā
sudhālaharī /
analyzed: sudhā alaharī

original: ullāsaḥ phullapaṅkeruhapaṭalatanmattapuṣpaṃdhayānāṃ nistāraḥ śokadāvānalavikalahṛdāṃ kokasīmantinīnām /
analyzed: ullāsaḥ phulla paṅkeruha paṭala tad matta puṣpaṃdhayānām nistāraḥ śoka dāva anala vikala hṛdām koka sīmantinīnām

original: utpātastāmasānāmupahatamahasāṃ cakṣuṣāṃ pakṣapātaḥ saṃghātaḥ ko 'pi dhāmnāmayamudayagiriprāntataḥ prādurāsīt // JSudh_1 //
analyzed: utpātaḥ tāmasānām upahata mahasām cakṣuṣām pakṣapātaḥ saṃghātaḥ kaḥ pi dhāmnām ayam udayagiri prāntataḥ prādurāsīt

original: padmadrohoddhurāṇāṃ dhavalitaharitāmaindavīnāṃ dyutīnāṃ darpaṃ drāgdrāvayanto vidaladaruṇimodrekadedīpyamānāḥ /
analyzed: padma droha uddhurāṇām dhavalita haritām aindavīnām dyutīnām darpam drāk drāvayantaḥ vidalat aruṇima udreka dedīpyamānāḥ

original: dūrādevāndhakārāndhitadharaṇaitaladyotane baddhadīkṣāste dainyadhvaṃsadakṣā mudamudayadinodveladusrā diśantu // JSudh_2 //
analyzed: dūrāt eva andhakāra andhita dharaṇaiḥ tala dyotane baddha dīkṣāḥ te dainya dhvaṃsa dakṣāḥ mudam udaya dina udvela dusrāḥ diśantu

original: trātāmīvārtalakṣāḥ pratidinavihitānekagīrvāṇarakṣā bhaktānāṃ kalpavṛkṣāḥ sphuradanalagatasvarṇabhāsāṃ sadṛkṣāḥ /
analyzed: trāta amīva ārta lakṣāḥ prati dina vihita aneka gīrvāṇa rakṣāḥ bhaktānām kalpavṛkṣāḥ sphurat anala gata svarṇa bhāsām sadṛkṣāḥ

original: lokakṣemāttadīkṣā nalinapariṣadāṃ dattasaubhāgyalākṣā durvṛttadhvaṃsadakṣā mama ravikiraṇāḥ santvaghānāṃ vipakṣāḥ // JSudh_3 //
analyzed: loka kṣema ātta dīkṣāḥ nalina pariṣadām datta saubhāgya lākṣāḥ durvṛtta dhvaṃsa dakṣāḥ mama ravi kiraṇāḥ santu aghānām vipakṣāḥ

original: prāleyānāṃ karālāḥ kavalitajagatīmaṇḍaladhvāntajālāḥ strātasvarlokapālā vidaladaruṇimakṣiptabālapravālāḥ /
analyzed: prāleyānām karālāḥ kavalita jagatī maṇḍala dhvānta jālāḥ strāta svar lokapālāḥ vidalat aruṇima kṣipta bāla pravālāḥ

original: viśliṣyatkokabālājvaraharaṇabhavatkīrtijālairjaṭālā vyomavyāptau viśālāstvayi dadhatu śivaṃ bhāsvato bhānumālāḥ // JSudh_4 //
analyzed: viśliṣyat koka bālā jvara haraṇa bhavat kīrti jālaiḥ jaṭālāḥ vyoma vyāptau viśālāḥ tvayi dadhatu śivam bhāsvataḥ bhānu mālāḥ

original: nirbhidye kṣmāruhāṇāmatighanamudaraṃ yeṣu gotrāṃ gateṣu drādhiṣṭhasvarṇadaṇḍabhramabhṛtamanasaḥ saṃnidhitsanti pādān /
analyzed: nirbhidye kṣmāruhāṇām ati ghanam udaram yeṣu gotrām gateṣu drādhiṣṭha svarṇa daṇḍa bhrama bhṛta manasaḥ saṃnidhitsanti pādān

original: yaiḥ saṃbhinne dalāgrapracalahimakaṇe dāḍimībījabuddhyā cañcūcāñcalyamañcanti ca śukaśiśavasteṃ 'śavaḥ pāntu bhānoḥ // JSudh_5 //
analyzed: yaiḥ saṃbhinne dala agra pracala hima kaṇe dāḍimī bīja buddhyā cañcū cāñcalyam añcanti ca śuka śiśavaḥ śavaḥ pāntu bhānoḥ

original: ahni krīḍocitānāṃ sarasiruhalasanmandirāṇāṃ prabhāte prodghāṭya drākkapāṭānyatha kumudagṛhānmudrayanto vimuktān /
analyzed: ahni krīḍā ucitānām sarasiruha lasat mandirāṇām prabhāte prodghāṭya drāk kapāṭāni atha kumuda gṛhān mudrayantaḥ vimuktān

original: siñcantaḥ kiṃ ca bhūmītalamakhilamapi kṣuṇṇakāśmīranīraiḥ pāyāsuḥ śrīsaparyāviracanapaṭavaḥ padmabandhoḥ karā naḥ // JSudh_6 //
analyzed: siñcantaḥ kim ca bhūmī talam akhilam api kṣuṇṇa kāśmīra nīraiḥ pāyāsuḥ śrī saparyā viracana paṭavaḥ padmabandhoḥ karāḥ naḥ

original: ālepā hiṅgulānāmiva dharaṇibhujāmacchasaudhāgramauliṣvagreṣu kṣmāruhāṇāmabhinavavidalatpallavollāsalīlāḥ /
analyzed: ālepāḥ hiṅgulānām iva dharaṇi bhujām accha saudha agra mauliṣu agreṣu kṣmāruhāṇām abhinava vidalat pallava ullāsa līlāḥ

original: prauḍhaprāleyapuñjopari citasvadirāṅgārabhārā ivārātpārāvārātprayānto dinakarakiraṇā maṅgalaṃ naḥ kṛṣīran // JSudh_7 //
analyzed: prauḍha prāleya puñja upari cita svadira aṅgāra bhārāḥ iva ārāt pārāvārāt prayāntaḥ dinakara kiraṇāḥ maṅgalam naḥ kṛṣīran

original: kīlālaiḥ kuṅkumānāṃ nikhilamapi jagajjālametanniṣiktaṃ muktāśconmattabhṛṅgāvidalitakamalakroḍakārāgṛhebhyaḥ /
analyzed: kīlālaiḥ kuṅkumānām nikhilam api jagat jālam etat niṣiktam muktāḥ ca unmatta bhṛṅgā vidalita kamala kroḍa kārā gṛhebhyaḥ

original: utsṛṣṭaṃ gosahasraṃ bahalakalakalaḥ śrūyate ca dvijānāṃ bhāgyairvṛndārakāṇāṃ harihayaharitā sūyate putraratnam // JSudh_8 //
analyzed: utsṛṣṭam go sahasram bahala kalakalaḥ śrūyate ca dvijānām bhāgyaiḥ vṛndārakāṇām hari haya haritā sūyate putra ratnam

original: yā sūte savabhūteṣvanudinamudaye cetanāyā vilāsānyāntī sāyaṃ nikāyaṃ jalanidhijaṭharaṃ saṃjarīharti sadyaḥ /
analyzed: yā sūte sava bhūteṣu anudinam udaye cetanāyāḥ vilāsān yāntī sāyam nikāyam jalanidhi jaṭharam saṃjarīharti sadyas

original: atyarthaṃ vardhayantī maṇigaṇasuṣamāsaṃpadaṃ ratnasānoḥ sā no bhānoḥ prabhā no nayanasaraṇito dūrato jātu yātu // JSudh_9 //
analyzed: atyartham vardhayantī maṇi gaṇa suṣamā saṃpadam ratna sānoḥ sā naḥ bhānoḥ prabhā naḥ nayana saraṇitaḥ dūratas jātu yātu

original: nīhārairnīrajānāṃ nibiḍatamatamorāśibhirlocanānāṃ śrautasmārtakriyāṇāmapi khalu niśayā nāśamālakṣya dūrāt /
analyzed: nīhāraiḥ nīrajānām nibiḍatama tamaḥ rāśibhiḥ locanānām śrauta smārta kriyāṇām api khalu niśayā nāśam ālakṣya dūrāt

original: sadyaḥ sindhoḥ sakāśādadhikatarajavenāgatā vāsavāśāmāśāpāśānaśeṣānapaharatutarāṃ tīkṣṇabhānoḥ prabhā naḥ // JSudh_10 //
analyzed: sadyas sindhoḥ sakāśāt adhikatara javena āgatā vāsava āśām āśā pāśān aśeṣān apaharatutarām tīkṣṇabhānoḥ prabhā naḥ

original: śīte śokaṃ śaśāṅke kṛśatamarucitāmāśunāśaṃ niśāyāṃ dhikkāraṃ dhvāntavarge kumudapariṣadi prodgamaṃ dīnatāyāḥ /
analyzed: śīte śokam śaśāṅke kṛśa tamaḥ ruci tām āśu nāśam niśāyām dhikkāram dhvānta varge kumuda pariṣadi prodgamam dīna tāyāḥ

original: pāṇḍityaṃ puṇḍarīkeṣvanudinamadhikāṃ kāntimāśāsu tanvannanvañcatyanvahaṃ dyāmuṣasi karuṇayā viśvavandyo vivasvān // JSudh_11 //
analyzed: pāṇḍityam puṇḍarīkeṣu anudinam adhikām kāntim āśāsu tanvan anu añcati anvaham dyām uṣasi karuṇayā viśva vandyaḥ vivasvān

original: svāpaṃ svāpākulānāṃ gadamatha gadināmandhakāraṃ trilokyāḥ pāpaṃ pāpāvilānāṃ sapadi pariharannāgato vāsavāśām /
analyzed: svāpam svāpa ākulānām gadam atha gadinām andhakāram trilokyāḥ pāpam pāpa āvilānām sapadi pariharan āgataḥ vāsava āśām

original: nityaprasthānalīlākupitakamalinīnarmanirmāṇakarmā viśvārtitrāṇadharmā gaganamaṇirasau pātu śarmāniśaṃ vaḥ // JSudh_12 //
analyzed: nitya prasthāna līlā kupita kamalinī narma nirmāṇa karmā viśva ārti trāṇa dharmā gaganamaṇiḥ asau pātu śarma aniśam vaḥ

original: antarnīraṃ nadīnāmanudinamudaye bimbitā ye samantādgīrvāṇādrerudañcanmaṇigaṇajaṭilāṃ medinīṃ darśayanti /
analyzed: antar nīram nadīnām anudinam udaye bimbitāḥ ye samantāt gīrvāṇa adreḥ udañcat maṇi gaṇa jaṭilām medinīm darśayanti

original: vipraprotkṣiptasaṃdhyāñjalijalakaṇikājālamākāśamadhye māṇikyavrātayanto mama mihirakarā māndyamunmūlayantu // JSudh_13 //
analyzed: vipra protkṣipta saṃdhyā añjali jala kaṇikā jālam ākāśa madhye māṇikya vrātayantaḥ mama mihira karāḥ māndyam unmūlayantu

original: pratyagroḍhāḥ pragalbhā yuvatipariṣadaḥ proṣitaprāṇanāthā yasminnastādrimauleruparimaṇimayacchatralīlāṃ dadhāne /
analyzed: pratyagra ūḍhāḥ pragalbhāḥ yuvati pariṣadaḥ proṣita prāṇanāthāḥ yasmin astādri mauleḥ upari maṇi maya chatra līlām dadhāne

original: satrāsaṃ saprasādaṃ pariṇatakaruṇaṃ locanānyutkṣipanti sthemānaṃ sa priyāṇāṃ ghaṭayatu bhagavānpadminīvallabho vaḥ // JSudh_14 //
analyzed: sa trāsam sa prasādam pariṇata karuṇam locanāni utkṣipanti sthemānam sa priyāṇām ghaṭayatu bhagavān padminī vallabhaḥ vaḥ

original: antardyāvāpṛthivyoradhirajani bhṛtānandhakārānudārānvidrāvya drāktadīyairiva jayadaruṇaṃ śoṇitairyadvidhate /
analyzed: antar dyāvāpṛthivyoḥ adhiḥ ajani bhṛtān andhakārān udārān vidrāvya drāk tadīyaiḥ iva jayat aruṇam śoṇitaiḥ yat vidhate

original: sāyaṃ prātaśca saṃdhyāñjalimavanisurāḥ saṃprayacchanti yasmai tasmai kasmaicidetanmama paramahaṃse devatāyai namo 'stu // JSudh_15 //
analyzed: sāyam prātar ca saṃdhyā añjalim avani surāḥ saṃprayacchanti yasmai tasmai kasmaicid etat mama paramahaṃse devatāyai namaḥ stu

original: trāṇaṃ traiviṣṭapānāṃ taraṇamatha payastomatāmyattanūnāṃ nadyantānāmatarkyaṃ triguṇamayatayā yattrayāṇāṃ turīyam /
analyzed: trāṇam traiviṣṭapānām taraṇam atha payaḥ stoma tāmyat tanūnām nadī antānām atarkyam triguṇa maya tayā yat trayāṇām turīyam

original: tattādṛktundilāyāstaruṇataratamaḥsaṃtaterantakṛttvāṃ tejastrailokyatāmrīkaraṇacaturima trāyatāṃ tīkṣṇabhānoḥ // JSudh_16 //
analyzed: tat tādṛś tundilāyāḥ taruṇatara tamaḥ saṃtateḥ anta kṛt tvām tejaḥ trailokya tāmrīkaraṇa caturima trāyatām tīkṣṇabhānoḥ

original: gīrvāṇagrāmaṇībhirgaganatalagatairgīrbhirudgīthagābhirgandharvaiścāpi gītā guṇagaṇagāramodgārigāthāsahasraiḥ /
analyzed: gīrvāṇa grāmaṇībhiḥ gagana tala gataiḥ gīrbhiḥ udgītha gābhiḥ gandharvaiḥ ca api gītāḥ guṇa gaṇa gārama udgāri gāthā sahasraiḥ

original: gāhaṃ gāhaṃ gṛhālīragatikagadināṃ gandhayanto gadārtiṃ glānigrāmaṃ grasantāṃ graharuciguravo gopatergovilāsāḥ // JSudh_17 //
analyzed: gāham gāham gṛha ālīra gatika gadinām gandhayantaḥ gada ārtim glāni grāmam grasantām graha ruci guravaḥ gopateḥ go vilāsāḥ

original: jīvāturjāḍyajālādhikajanitarujāṃ taptajāmbūnadābhaṃ jaṅghālaṃ jāṅghikānāṃ jaladhijaṭharato jṛmbhamāṇaṃ jagatyām /
analyzed: jīvātuḥ jāḍya jāla adhika janita rujām tapta jāmbūnada ābham jaṅghālam jāṅghikānām jaladhi jaṭharataḥ jṛmbhamāṇam jagatyām

original: jīvādhānaṃ janānāṃ janakamatha ruco jīvajaivātṛkāderjyotirjājvalyamānaṃ jalajahitakṛto jāyatāṃ vo jayāya // JSudh_18 //
analyzed: jīvādhānam janānām janakam atha rucaḥ jīvajaivātṛka ādeḥ jyotiḥ jājvalyamānam jalaja hita kṛtaḥ jāyatām vaḥ jayāya

original: prātarnirgatya gobhiḥ saha ruciviṣaye saṃcarantyo 'hni tābhiḥ sākaṃ sāyaṃ nikāyaṃ prati punarapi yāḥ saṃprayātuṃ tvarante /
analyzed: prātar nirgatya gobhiḥ saha ruci viṣaye saṃcarantyaḥ hni tābhiḥ sākam sāyam nikāyam prati punar api yāḥ saṃprayātum tvarante

original: yāsāṃ divyaprabhāvastrijagadaghavanaśreṇidāhaikadāvaḥ kṣemaṃ tanvantu tā vaḥ śivamayavapuṣo vāsareśasya gāvaḥ // JSudh_19 //
analyzed: yāsām divya prabhāvaḥ trijagat agha vana śreṇi dāha eka dāvaḥ kṣemam tanvantu tāḥ vaḥ śiva maya vapuṣaḥ vāsara īśasya gāvaḥ

original: vṛndairvṛndārakāṇāṃ danutanujanuṣāṃ rakṣasāṃ ca kṣapānte gandharvāṇāṃ dhurīṇaiḥ praṇatamahivaraiḥ kiṃnarairyannaraiśca /
analyzed: vṛndaiḥ vṛndārakāṇām danu tanu januṣām rakṣasām ca kṣapā ante gandharvāṇām dhurīṇaiḥ praṇata mahi varaiḥ kiṃnaraiḥ yad naraiḥ ca

original: vidyāṃ hṛdyāṃ nijebhyo vitaradavirataṃ dīptibhirdīpayaddyāmadyādādyāmavidyāmidamudayagirerudyadarkasya bimbam // JSudh_20 //
analyzed: vidyām hṛdyām nijebhyaḥ vitarat aviratam dīptibhiḥ dīpayat dyām adyādādyām avidyām idam udayagireḥ udyat arkasya bimbam

original: ā pāthojāsanāyuḥ kṣaṇalavaghaṭikādyātmakaṃ kālacakraṃ prāhuḥ pūrve purāṇāgamaviṣayavido yasya līlāvilāsam /
analyzed: ā kṣaṇa lava ghaṭikā ādi ātmakam kālacakram prāhuḥ pūrve purāṇa āgama viṣaya vidaḥ yasya līlā vilāsam

original: bhāvānāṃ ṣaḍvikārānatha khalu gatibhiryaśca nityaṃ prasūte sa prātaḥ pauruhūte parilasati harinmaṇḍale caṇḍabhānuḥ // JSudh_21 //
analyzed: bhāvānām ṣaṣ vikārān atha khalu gatibhiḥ yaḥ ca nityam prasūte sa prātar pauruhūte parilasati harit maṇḍale caṇḍabhānuḥ

original: aṅgāni brāhmaṇānāmuṣasi himabharāsaṅgato bhaṅgurāṇi vyālakṣya drākprapātā ripujanitaruṣevāruṇā vāsavāśām /
analyzed: aṅgāni brāhmaṇānām uṣasi hima bhara āsaṅgataḥ bhaṅgurāṇi vyālakṣya drāk prapātāḥ ripu janita ruṣā iva aruṇāḥ vāsava āśām

original: dharmadhvaṃsoddhurāṇāmakhilamapi kulaṃ jakṣataḥ śobhitakṣmā yakṣmāṇaṃ me harantu tvaritamaghabhido bhānavaścaṇḍabhānoḥ // JSudh_22 //
analyzed: dharma dhvaṃsa uddhurāṇām akhilam api kulam jakṣataḥ śobhita kṣmā yakṣmāṇam me harantu tvaritam agha bhidaḥ bhānavaḥ caṇḍabhānoḥ

original: viśrāntiṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ sukhamatiśayitaṃ kāmināṃ sthāyilīlāmambhojānāṃ prabodhaṃ kumudapariṣadāṃ yaścikīrṣandayārdraḥ /
analyzed: viśrāntim brāhmaṇānām sukham atiśayitam kāminām sthāyi līlām ambhojānām prabodham kumuda pariṣadām yaḥ cikīrṣan dayā ārdraḥ

original: niryātyantaḥsamudraṃ sakalamapi nṛṇāṃ bhāramādhāya vahnāvahnāyāhnāmadhīśaḥ sa bhavatu bhavatāṃ bhūyase maṅgalāya // JSudh_23 //
analyzed: niryāti antar samudram sakalam api nṛṇām bhāram ādhāya vahnau ahnāya ahnām adhīśaḥ sa bhavatu bhavatām bhūyase maṅgalāya

original: drāgāhatya prabhāte rajanihimavataḥ kaumudīḥ kautukena prodyatprauḍhānukampāḥ punarapi khalu ye sāyamujjīvayanti /
analyzed: drāk āhatya prabhāte rajani himavataḥ kaumudīḥ kautukena prodyat prauḍha anukampāḥ punar api khalu ye sāyam ujjīvayanti

original: āruṇye pallavānāmatha gurucaraṇāḥ śakragopāvalīnāṃ te yuṣmadbhāvalīnāṃ dinakarakiraṇāḥ klāntimunmūlayantu // JSudh_24 //
analyzed: āruṇye pallavānām atha guru caraṇāḥ śakragopa āvalīnām te yuṣmad bhāva līnām dinakara kiraṇāḥ klāntim unmūlayantu

original: drāgadvaitaṃ vitanvaṃstribhuvanamabhitaḥ kauṅkumīnāṃ dyutīnāṃ nyakkurvanmāndyamudrāmatha rajanirujāṃ kokasīmantinīnām /
analyzed: drāk advaitam vitanvan tribhuvanam abhitas kauṅkumīnām dyutīnām nyakkurvan māndya mudrām atha rajani rujām koka sīmantinīnām

original: tandrāndhānāndhyasindhoriha vitatatarairuddadhānaṃ karāgraiḥ svāntadhvāntaṃ dhunītāmudayagiriśiraścumbi mārtaṇḍabimbam // JSudh_25 //
analyzed: tandrā andha anāndhya sindhoḥ iha vitatataraiḥ uddadhānam kara agraiḥ svānta dhvāntam dhunītām udayagiri śiraḥ cumbi mārtaṇḍa bimbam

original: śuddhaṃ brahmālavālaṃ prakṛtiśabalitaṃ yasya mūlaṃ karāstaddrādhiṣṭasvarṇaśākhā vikasadaruṇimā pallavānāṃ vilāsaḥ /
analyzed: śuddham brahma ālavālam prakṛti śabalitam yasya mūlam karāḥ tad drādhiṣṭa svarṇa śākhā vikasat aruṇimā pallavānām vilāsaḥ

original: nīlaṃ vyomālimālā surasaphalabharo dharmakāmārthamokṣāḥ sa śrīmānvāñchitārthaṃ vitaratu satataṃ sūryakalpadrumo vaḥ // JSudh_26 //
analyzed: nīlam vyoma ali mālā su rasa phala bharaḥ dharma kāma artha mokṣāḥ sa śrīmān vāñchita artham vitaratu satatam sūrya kalpadrumaḥ vaḥ

original: nīhāraṃ nimnagābhyo nikhilanayanato nīrajebhyaśca nidrāṃ nīḍebhyo nīḍajānāṃ nikaramuṣasi ye nityamudvāsayanti /
analyzed: nīhāram nimnagābhyaḥ nikhila nayanataḥ nīrajebhyaḥ ca nidrām nīḍebhyaḥ nīḍajānām nikaram uṣasi ye nityam udvāsayanti

original: sāyaṃ teṣveva teṣāṃ punarapi ghṛṇayā kalpayante ca vāsaṃ te vaḥ santu prayāsaṃ ghṛṇighanaghṛṇayo hantumābaddhakakṣāḥ // JSudh_27 //
analyzed: sāyam teṣu eva teṣām punar api ghṛṇayā kalpayante ca vāsam te vaḥ santu prayāsam ghṛṇi ghana ghṛṇayaḥ hantum ābaddha kakṣāḥ

original: saṃhṛtya drāgbahiḥsthaṃ timirakulamathābhyantaraṃ hartukāmā randhrālībhirgṛhāṇāmudaramanudinaṃ ye viśaṅkaṃ viśanti /
analyzed: saṃhṛtya drāk bahis stham timira kulam atha abhyantaram hartu kāmāḥ randhra ālībhiḥ gṛhāṇām udaram anudinam ye viśaṅkam viśanti

original: bhānoste 'mī hṛṣīkāṇyakhilatanubhṛtāṃ harṣayanto hitehā hṛdrogaṃ saṃharantāṃ himamahimahṛto hemahṛdyāḥ karā naḥ // JSudh_28 //
analyzed: bhānoḥ te mī hṛṣīkāṇi akhila tanubhṛtām harṣayantaḥ hita īhāḥ hṛd rogam saṃharantām hima mahima hṛtaḥ hema hṛdyāḥ karāḥ naḥ

original: brahmāṇḍaṃ maṇḍayanto viyati valayino maṇḍalairaṇḍajānāṃ pākhaṇḍāndaṇḍayanto danutanujanuṣāṃ śobhitākhaṇḍālāśāḥ /
analyzed: brahmāṇḍam maṇḍayantaḥ viyati valayinaḥ maṇḍala eraṇḍajānām pākhaṇḍān daṇḍayantaḥ danu tanu januṣām śobhita ākhaṇḍa ālāśāḥ

original: ye khaṇḍānpauṇḍarīkānvidalayitumathoddaṇḍapāṇḍityabhājaste caṇḍāṃśoracaṇḍāstvaritamiha karāḥ pāṇḍutāṃ khaṇḍayantu // JSudh_29 //
analyzed: ye khaṇḍān pauṇḍarīkān vidalayitum atha uddaṇḍa pāṇḍitya bhājaḥ te caṇḍāṃśoḥ acaṇḍāḥ tvaritam iha karāḥ pāṇḍu tām khaṇḍayantu

original: ūrdhvaṃ pāpāvalibhyaḥ sthita iti jagade yasya vedairudākhyā ninyuḥ ke 'pyāsanārthaṃ khalu sahacaratāṃ netrayoḥ puṇḍarīkam /
analyzed: ūrdhvam pāpa āvalibhyaḥ sthitaḥ iti jagade yasya vedaiḥ udākhyāḥ ninyuḥ ke pi āsana artham khalu sahacaratām netrayoḥ puṇḍarīkam

original: oṣṭhāvṛksāma yasya drutakanakanibhaśmaśrukeśākhilāṅgaḥ so 'yaṃ sarvāntarātmā tava diśatutarāṃ vāsareśaḥ śivāni // JSudh_30 //
analyzed: oṣṭhāvṛk sāma yasya druta kanaka nibha śmaśru keśa akhila aṅgaḥ saḥ yam sarva antarātmā tava diśatutarām vāsara īśaḥ śivāni

original: iti paṇḍitarājaśrījagannāthaviracitā sudhālaharī samāptā /
analyzed: iti paṇḍita rāja śrī jagannātha viracitā sudhālaharī samāptā
